statements: SELECT movie_title, release_date FROM upcoming_movie_releases WHERE movie_id = 1;
SELECT movie_title, lead_actress FROM upcoming_movie_releases WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM upcoming_movie_releases WHERE release_date < '2022-06-01' AND lead_actress LIKE 'Emma%';
SELECT movie_title FROM upcoming_movie_releases WHERE lead_actress = 'Scarlett Johansson' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT lead_actress FROM upcoming_movie_releases ORDER BY lead_actress ASC;
SELECT * FROM upcoming_movie_releases WHERE movie_title LIKE '%Drama%' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT movie_title, release_date FROM upcoming_movie_releases WHERE lead_actress = 'Jennifer Lawrence';
SELECT movie_id, movie_title, release_date FROM upcoming_movie_releases WHERE release_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY release_date ASC;
SELECT movie_id, movie_title, release_date FROM upcoming_movie_releases WHERE lead_actress IN ('Emma Stone', 'Scarlett Johansson') AND release_date < '2024-01-01';
SELECT * FROM upcoming_movie_releases WHERE movie_title != 'Black Widow' AND release_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM upcoming_movies;
SELECT movie_title, actress, release_date FROM upcoming_movies ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT movie_title, actress FROM upcoming_movies WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT actress_name, biography FROM actress_bio;
SELECT actress_name, biography FROM actress_bio WHERE LENGTH(biography) > 100;
SELECT * FROM upcoming_movies WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT movie_title, actress FROM upcoming_movies WHERE actress = 'Scarlett Johansson';
SELECT movie_title, release_date FROM upcoming_movies WHERE actress = 'Gal Gadot';
SELECT DISTINCT actress FROM upcoming_movies;
SELECT * FROM actress_bio WHERE biography LIKE '%award%';
SELECT movie_title, release_date FROM upcoming_movies;
SELECT review_id, review_text, rating FROM movie_reviews WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT DISTINCT actress_name FROM upcoming_movies;
SELECT * FROM movie_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT movie_title, release_date, actress_name FROM upcoming_movies JOIN actress_details ON upcoming_movies.actress_name = actress_details.actress_name;
SELECT * FROM upcoming_movies WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT movie_title, release_date FROM upcoming_movies ORDER BY release_date DESC
SELECT movie_title, actress_name FROM upcoming_movies WHERE actress_name = 'Emma Watson'
SELECT * FROM movie_reviews WHERE rating >= 4.5 ORDER BY review_id ASC
SELECT * FROM actress_details WHERE nationality = 'French'
SELECT * FROM upcoming_movies;
SELECT movie_title, release_date FROM upcoming_movies ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT actress_name, age, nationality FROM actress WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT movie_title, rating FROM upcoming_movies JOIN movie_ratings ON upcoming_movies.movie_id = movie_ratings.movie_id;
SELECT movie_title, release_date, review_text, rating FROM upcoming_movies JOIN movie_reviews ON upcoming_movies.movie_id = movie_reviews.movie_id WHERE rating > 3
SELECT * FROM upcoming_movies ORDER BY release_date DESC, movie_title ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT movie_title, release_date, actress_name FROM upcoming_movies JOIN actress ON upcoming_movies.actress_name = actress.actress_name WHERE age > 30;
SELECT movie_title, release_date, review_text FROM upcoming_movies JOIN movie_reviews ON upcoming_movies.movie_id = movie_reviews.movie_id WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT actress_name, age, nationality FROM actress WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 35 ORDER BY nationality DESC;
SELECT movie_title, user_rating FROM upcoming_movies JOIN movie_ratings ON upcoming_movies.movie_id = movie_ratings.movie_id WHERE user_id = 12345 ORDER BY user_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM Actresses;
SELECT title, genre FROM Movies WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT name, nationality FROM Directors ORDER BY nationality DESC;
SELECT title, release_date FROM Movies WHERE genre = 'Drama';
SELECT name, age FROM Actresses WHERE nationality = 'USA' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Actresses WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT title, genre FROM Movies WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY genre;
SELECT name, nationality FROM Directors WHERE nationality = 'American';
SELECT title, rating FROM Movies JOIN Reviews ON Movies.id = Reviews.movie_id WHERE rating > 8;

SELECT Actresses.name, MovieCasts.role, Movies.title FROM Actresses JOIN MovieCasts ON Actresses.id = MovieCasts.actress_id JOIN Movies ON MovieCasts.movie_id = Movies.id WHERE role = 'Lead' ORDER BY Actresses.name ASC;
